entry.title: No watches or warnings in effect, Rancheria
entry.summary: No watches or warnings in effect.

entry.title: Sunday night: A few clouds. Low minus 33.
entry.summary: A few clouds. Wind up to 15 km/h. Low minus 33. Wind chill minus 16 this evening and minus 39 overnight. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 4:00 PM MST Sunday 05 March 2023

entry.title: Monday: Sunny. High minus 14.
entry.summary: Sunny. Wind up to 15 km/h. High minus 14. Wind chill minus 39 in the morning and minus 17 in the afternoon. Risk of frostbite. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 4:00 PM MST Sunday 05 March 2023

entry.title: Monday night: Partly cloudy. Low minus 29.
